subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Running back Andre Brown, who replaced the injured Ahmad Bradshaw, and receiver Ramses Barden, filling in for Hakeem Nicks, provided welcome support in the Giants’ dominant victory over the Panthers.
snippet: Running back Andre Brown, who replaced the injured Ahmad Bradshaw, and receiver Ramses Barden, filling in for Hakeem Nicks, provided welcome support in the Giants’ dominant victory over the Panthers.
